mapper.sql: id, inst_name, short_name, cqd_id, slogan, introduction, phone, address, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, comments
mapper.insert:
select replace(UUID(),'-','')
insert into sys_medical_inst
id, inst_name, short_name, cqd_id, slogan, introduction, phone, address, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, comments,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cqdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{slogan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

insert into sys_medical_inst
id, inst_name, short_name, cqd_id, slogan, introduction, phone, address, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, comments,
replace(UUID(),'-',''), #{map.instName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{map.shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{map.cqdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{map.slogan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{map.introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{map.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{map.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{map.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{map.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{map.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{map.updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{map.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{map.comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update sys_medical_inst
inst_name = #{map.instName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
short_name = #{map.shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cqd_id = #{map.cqdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
slogan = #{map.slogan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
introduction = #{map.introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{map.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{map.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{map.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_by = #{map.updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{map.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
comments = #{map.comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id = #{map.id}
mapper.delete: update sys_medical_inst set status = 0 where id = #{id}

update sys_medical_inst set status = 0
and id in #{id}
mapper.select:
select
from sys_medical_inst
and status != 0 and ${property} = #{value}
limit 0,1

select
from sys_medical_inst
and status != 0
order by ${orderBy} ${sortBy}

select
from sys_medical_inst
and status != 0
and inst_name like concat('%', #{condition.instName} , '%')
and short_name like concat('%', #{condition.shortName} , '%')
and cqd_id like concat('%', #{condition.cqdId} , '%')
and slogan like concat('%', #{condition.slogan} , '%')
and introduction like concat('%', #{condition.introduction} , '%')
and phone like concat('%', #{condition.phone} , '%')
and address like concat('%', #{condition.address} , '%')
and status like concat('%', #{condition.status} , '%')
and create_by like concat('%', #{condition.createBy} , '%')
and create_date like concat('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
and update_by like concat('%', #{condition.updateBy} , '%')
and update_date like concat('%', #{condition.updateDate} , '%')
and comments like concat('%', #{condition.comments} , '%')
order by ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
